fullText: Alan Rickman brings his trademark sardonic wit to the role of Leonard, a successful novelist who terrorizes aspiring writers in this comic drama by Theresa Rebeck.
dtliExcerpt: Alan Rickman brings his trademark sardonic wit to the role of Leonard, a successful novelist who terrorizes aspiring writers in this comic drama by Theresa Rebeck.
